purpose: Position Titanverse as 'The Everything App for Pharmacy Services' through full animated explainer video, showcasing comprehensive platform capabilities including smart consultations, AI templates, ambient voice technology, AI agents, and structured summaries.
core_message: The pharmacy doesn't need more tools. It needs one intelligent platform that does it all. Titanverse brings consultations, prescribing, payments, compliance and CRM together on one intelligent console.
summary: Full animated explainer video positioning Titanverse as the comprehensive platform for pharmacy services, demonstrating smart consultations, AI templates, MHRA-registered ambient voice technology, AI agents, and structured summaries. Video showcases complete platform capabilities in unified console.
